akn:section.akn:heading: Army industrial facilities: sales of manufactured articles or services outside Department of Defense

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Regulations under section 2208(h) of this title shall authorize a working-capital funded Army industrial facility (including a Department of the Army arsenal) that manufactures large caliber cannons, gun mounts, recoil mechanisms, ammunition, munitions, or components thereof to sell manufactured articles or services to a person outside the Department of Defense if—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Relationship to Arms Export Control Act.—

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Nothing in this section shall be construed to affect the application of the export controls provided for in section 38 of the Arms Export Control Act (22 U.S.C. 2778) to items which incorporate or are produced through the use of an article sold under this section.
